name: Reima Uiva Swim Shirt - Boys' - Children to Youths
categories: Toddler and child rashguards and sunguards
description:
All over sun protection, without all the sunscreen. Shield their sensitive skin from harmful UV rays all day long as they swim, paddle or dig in the sand.Quick-drying SunProof polyester provides UPF 50+ sun protection.Recycled fabric is made from plastic bottles.Flat seams don't chafe.Elbow-length sleeves and dropped hem add coverage.

        Sustainability
